title: Ep. 397: The State and 'Disinformation' | X-Men 97 is DOA
itunes:title: The State and 'Disinformation' | X-Men 97 is DOA
description:
In this episode of For Canon Sake, we talk about 'disinformation.'

We also discuss the new X-Men 97.
